name: Canvas Dark
description:
Not tested with other Instructure Canvas university websites, but I'm willing to bet it will work if you switch out the domain.

Designed for doing homework at 2AM.

Github: https://github.com/SicariusNoctis/Stylish-Canvas-Dark

Theme originally named "SFU 101 Canvas Modules Dark".
additional_info:
2016-07-16 Added corresponding -webkit-filters
2016-05-17 Dark equations/formulas, image hover white background
2016-05-10 Updates for new Canvas site.
2016-05-10 Renamed style to "Canvas Dark".
2015-05-10 Option for other university canvas websites.
2015-05-10 Fixed People/Group tables.
2015-03-28 Darkened Login/Sign out pages.
2014-10-29 Darkened "Grades" section table/sidebar.
2014-09-16 Added style for Discussions.
2014-09-16 Renamed style to "SFU Canvas Dark".

discussions.name: It's rather nice, but there are annoying white marks here.
